programme.title: The Bullet and the Virus
programme.short_synopsis: Africa Eye investigates the impact of the deadly coronavirus in Mathare.
programme.long_synopsis:
Africa Eye investigates the impact of the deadly coronavirus in Mathare, one of Kenya's poorest slums.

As the pandemic looms, heavy-handed policing leads to violence and a series of tragic deaths.

Reporting from Mathareâ€™s corona frontline, local journalist Elijah Kanyi asks: is the cure deadlier than the virus?
